data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Mara, Tanzania to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mara, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Mara
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: the state of Mara has (about) 191,638 people who know Jesus, 699,684 people who know about him culturally, and 852,478 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Mara.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Mara unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Mara.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Mara, Tanzania.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Mara, Tanzania has a population of 1,743,800.

We estimate Mara has 191,638 people who might know Jesus, 699,684 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 852,478 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.
